name: FAST AOC PTY LTD
about: FAST AOC PTY LTD, operating as FAST Aviation, is a reputable flying school established in 2016 to meet the demand for professional aircraft charter and advanced pilot training. Based in the Northern Rivers region of Australia, we have grown from a single Beechcraft Baron aircraft and one instructor to three company-owned Beechcraft Barons and five full-time pilots/instructors. Our instructors collectively hold over 45,000 hours of flight time and are experienced in various aspects of commercial aviation. We hold an Air Operators Certificate for Part 135 air transport operations and a Part 141 Certificate for flight training from the Civil Aviation Safety Authority. Our core values are Safety, Efficiency, and Professionalism, ensuring high-quality training and safe operations. We are committed to providing top-notch aviation education and charter services, making us a trusted choice for aspiring pilots and aviation professionals.
